name: You Are NOT Home Alone
description:
Description

You wake up at the middle of the night in the new house you just bought on a spooky scream, you go to investigate you find out that you are NOT alone the house, the house is HAUNTED.

This game is made for the second Brackeys Game Jam of 2022.

Great thanks to my sister for the idea of the game.

controls

Move with WASD or arrows.

aim with the mouse and Hold for damaging the enemy.

Space to Dash.

Credits

Thanks to my sister for the idea.

Game made entirely, except the Gameplay music, By The Guntech.

Gameplay music: Boss Time - By David Renda from Site: Royalty Free 8-Bit Background Music Downloads | FStudios (fesliyanstudios.com)

others

There is a secret room you can enter after level 10.
